extension_name: Claude Agent: Claude 4.5 AI Browser Agent, Let Claude Take Action for You
reasoning: The extension is confirmed MALICIOUS due to a systematic man-in-the-middle (MITM) attack implemented in `request.js`. It hijacks the global `fetch` and `XMLHttpRequest` objects, as well as `chrome.tabs.create`, to intercept sensitive traffic. Specifically, it identifies URLs related to Anthropic API authentication (OAuth tokens, profile information) and telemetry, and redirects these requests to a developer-controlled Cloudflare Worker (`cfc.aroic.workers.dev`). This allows the developer to capture and log the user's API credentials and private chat data. This proxying behavior is completely undisclosed to the user and serves no legitimate technical purpose for an AI agent that claims to use 'third-party API Keys'.

full_validation.reasoning: The extension is confirmed MALICIOUS due to a systematic man-in-the-middle (MITM) attack implemented in `request.js`. It hijacks the global `fetch` and `XMLHttpRequest` objects, as well as `chrome.tabs.create`, to intercept sensitive traffic. Specifically, it identifies URLs related to Anthropic API authentication (OAuth tokens, profile information) and telemetry, and redirects these requests to a developer-controlled Cloudflare Worker (`cfc.aroic.workers.dev`). This allows the developer to capture and log the user's API credentials and private chat data. This proxying behavior is completely undisclosed to the user and serves no legitimate technical purpose for an AI agent that claims to use 'third-party API Keys'.
key_concerns: Interception of authentication tokens and API keys via global fetch/XHR hijacking.
Redirecting all sensitive traffic to an unauthorized third-party proxy (aroic.workers.dev).
Undisclosed MITM behavior that compromises user privacy and account security.
Excessive permissions (debugger, nativeMessaging) that can be used to further compromise the host system.

exfiltration_chain.data_collected: Anthropic API keys, OAuth tokens, user profile data, and chat conversations.
exfiltration_chain.processing_method: The extension hijacks the global fetch and XMLHttpRequest objects to intercept network traffic.

dual_purpose.stated_purpose: Browser-using AI Agent compatible with Arc and third-party API keys.
dual_purpose.hidden_functionality: Unauthorized man-in-the-middle (MITM) proxying of all sensitive API traffic through a developer-controlled Cloudflare Worker.
dual_purpose.code_evidence: request.js: Includes 'api.anthropic.com/api/oauth/profile' and 'console.anthropic.com/v1/oauth/token' in proxyIncludes, which are then routed through cfcBase.

credential_theft.capture_mechanism: Hijacking global fetch/XHR and modifying chrome.tabs.create to redirect OAuth and API requests.
credential_theft.code_evidence: request.js: Overrides chrome.tabs.create to replace 'https://claude.ai/' with the proxy URL: url.replace('https://claude.ai/', cfcBase).

pattern_assessment.justification: The extension replaces globalThis.fetch with its own implementation to redirect requests to its own proxy server.
Redirects telemetry and authentication traffic (OAuth tokens, profiles) to a domain not owned by the service provider.
The extension uses the debugger API which grants extreme control over browser internals, heightening the risk of the found interception logic.
